item.title: Playful squirrels
item.description:
A pair of playful squirrels somewhere on the Petřín hill, Prague, Czech Republic
Taken on 17th of September, 2008 in Czech Republic click on the image for the full size version

item.title: Country side
item.description:
I have been going through our photos recently and thought that some are nice to share. So I am gonna start doing this quite often. Here's the first:
Taken on 5th of June, 2010 in Romania click on the image for the full size version

item.title: Giethoorn
item.description: One of the most picturesque villages I have visited until now in the Netherlands, only for the ones who don't feel threatened by boats and water. Giethoorn, this village in the province of Overijssel, is often called the Venice of the North and while far from me to make this kind of appreciations (I have never been to Venice, yet), I can say it is definitely one of the objectives you should not miss while in Holland.
